title: Trains experiencing delays between Admiralty and Kranji

title_translations.zh-Hans: Admiralty 和 Kranji 之间的火车延误
title_translations.ms: Kereta api mengalami kelewatan antara Admiralty dan Kranji
title_translations.ta: Admiralty மற்றும் Kranji இடையே ரயில்கள் தாமதமாகின்றன

updates.text: UPDATE: Trains travelling between Admiralty and Kranji in both directions are running smoothly now.
Trains are travelling slower between Admiralty and Kranji in both directions due to a track fault.
